about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating journey into the heart of cyber chaos with Cyber Strike, a nail-biting bullet hell dungeon crawler that thrusts you into the role of a cyber security expert turned virus bounty hunter. The digital realm is under siege by the nefarious Digital Devourer, the embodiment of true evil, as it voraciously consumes cyberspace, leaving destruction in its wake.

As the chosen hero, your mission is to navigate through butt-clenching shootouts, execute strategic dodges, and face off in epic cybernetic boss battles. The fate of the digital world rests squarely on your shoulders, and it's time to rewrite destiny to save cyberspace from the clutches of this insidious villains

Along the way, you'll encounter a diverse cast of intriguing new friends and allies, each with their own unique stories. Forge bonds, unravel mysteries, and gather the strength needed to confront the ultimate evil threatening to devour all of cyberspace.

Gear up, hone your skills, and dive headfirst into the thrilling adventure that Cyber Strike unfolds. Will you emerge victorious as the savior of cyberspace, or will the Digital Devourer reign supreme? The destiny of the digital world awaits you, hero.

name: Cyber Strike

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Cyber Strike is a butt clenching bullet hell dungeon crawler. Navigate through intense shootouts, strategic dodges, and cybernetic boss battles. Save a digital world from viruses and virtual foes. Rewrite destiny as you save cyber space in this thrilling adventure.
